name: Mage Escape (Fabio Tiburcio)
description: This is the game i made to the MixAndGameJam, the theme was Dimension Change, that propose to pick a mechanic in 2d and change to 3d or the other way around. The mechanic that i choose was the pick up coin,  and run throw the maze in Pacman, with that in mind i created a mage that can freeze an enemy for some time and run to collect all the power that he needs.
